Company Description
Linde is a leading global industrial gases and engineering company with 2023 sales of $33 billion. The company serves various end markets including chemicals & energy, food & beverage, electronics, healthcare, manufacturing, metals and mining. Linde's industrial gases are used in diverse applications like providing life-saving oxygen for hospitals and specialty gases for electronics manufacturing. Linde delivers state-of-the-art gas processing solutions to support customer expansion, improve efficiency, and reduce emissions.

Role Description
This is a full-time on-site role for a Customer Solutions Supervisor located in the Los Angeles Metropolitan Area. The Customer Solutions Supervisor will be responsible for overseeing and improving business processes, managing a team, ensuring effective communication, analyzing data, and delivering top-notch customer service on a daily basis.

Qualifications
  • Supervisory Skills and Business Process Improvement
  • Strong Communication and Analytical Skills
  • Customer Service expertise
  • Experience in managing a team and driving results
  • Ability to problem-solve and handle challenging situations
  • Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field
  • Previous experience in a customer service or related role
